column2: Mesopotamia
Striped MP
§GTitle Bloodlines§!
On
Bloodlines (such as Harald 'Fairhair' and Æthelstan's) can be aqcuired in earlier starts through making their respective titles.
Off
Bloodlines won't be created when title is formed.
Difficulty Rules
§BSpawn Great Conquerors§!
Some Independent Rulers will turn into Great Conquerors
No Independent Rulers will turn into Great Conquerors
§RNerf Crusade Rewards§!
Disable GHW gold pot and taking titles for yourself
Enable GHW gold pot and taking titles for yourself
§RNerf Papal Request Claim§!
Extra -50 to request claim acceptance
Vanilla settings
Extra -100 to request claim acceptance
§BLimit Redundunt Diplomatic Responses§!
Vanilla settings
Only disable responses for sell prisoner, join court, revoke/retract vassal (since always means war)
Basic plus many diplomatic actions only notify on decline, assume they were accepted otherwise
§RPenalize Massive Realms§!
Player Only
This option will grant characters with at least one Kingdom or Empire title modifiers depending on how much Realm Size they control
This option will only grant the Player with at least one Kingdom or Empire title modifiers depending on how much Realm Size they control. AI will not get these modifiers, except Tiny/Small realms.
This option will turn of the modifiers getting granted
